title: Inheritance Wars: Who Gets the Money?
overview: The death of a parent is a time of grief. But for many, the worst is yet to come. A will can provide for your family financially. But fighting over money can tear it apart. In this gripping and shocking series we reveal heart breaking true stories of families who have been dragged through the courts by grief and greed. We capture every twist and turn of their rollercoaster legal battles hearing from those at the heart of each story.We also reveal tales of the rich and famous who died leaving wills that caused absolute havoc among those they left behind. Featuring candid interviews, stylish reconstruction and spine-tingling tales of families at war, this series will have you gripped from start to finish.
